title: Gamification-Based Mathematics Education Program for Enhancing Adult Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills and experience in solving everyday mathematical problems
context.additional_context: Interactive math problem-solving activities incorporating game elements in VR environments, with direct instruction to reinforce concept explanations

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems (e.g., payroll calculation, budget management) presented in VR simulations with ≥80% accuracy
Through gamification activities, learners can simulate mathematical decision-making processes ≥2 times per week
After direct instruction sessions, learners can define ≥90% of core math terms (e.g., percentage, ratio) accurately

resources: Digital Textbook for Math Concept Explanation

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
